artist: Raymond Pettibon; Cristin Sheehan Sullivan; Text by Joel J. Rane; Book design by Amy Mees and Mark Wagner; Published by Booklyn Artists Alliance, New York, NY
creditline: The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books
description: book with hard cover covered in various library stickers and constructed to appear as if the cover is attached backwards; library circulation card and pocket on front cover; book fits into grey string-tied box; orange and black illustrations and black text
dimension: 9 13/16 x 7 x 5/8 in. (24.92 x 17.78 x 1.59 cm) (book only, closed)
marks: Signature, Edition and Stamp on library circulation card, in black ink: [Joel J
medium: Artist's book: color screenprints, letterpress, and collage; housed in a folding cardboard box with ties
title: Scream at the Librarian: Sketches of our Patrons in Downtown Los Angeles
